name: Side to Side Push Ups
how_to_perform:
1. Start in a plank position with your hands shoulder-width apart on the ground and your body forming a straight line from your head to your heels.
2. Move one hand forward and place it beside your chest, while keeping the other hand in its original position.
3. Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, but keep your back flat and your core engaged.
4. Push back up to the starting position, then quickly move the second hand to the opposite side of your chest.
5. Continue alternating sides with each repetition.
short_summary: Side to Side Push Ups are a variation of the traditional push-up exercise that targets the same muscle groups but also involves lateral movement.
